value:
$nMPID_双界ソニア|Feels real good to be needed by
an adoring crowd. It's a festival,
after all! Mustn't disappoint.

$nMPID_双界ソニア|I had two older sisters, and they
spoiled me rotten.$k$pRight now it feels as though I have
a little sister of my own, and I must
say—it's a lot of fun!

$nMPID_サーリャ|Henry is here at the festival? Be
on your guard. I can tell from his
face that he's up to something.

$nMPID_双界ソニア|You always dress so beautifully, dear
Tharja! But your spring festival garb
will ensure you're the star.

$nMPID_サーリャ|If you intentionally made this outfit
excessively constrictive, I'll hex you.

$nMPID_サーリャ|If you don't come to the spring
festival, I will be forced to curse
you. Blame $Nf.

$nMPID_サーリャ|Hippity-hoppity-hooray! Is this...
really going to make him happy?

$nMPID_双界ソニア|What's caught your attention? Not
me, I suppose? Hee-hee.
$nMPID_サーリャ|You're so carefree. I am not.

$nMPID_双界ソニア|You have my sincere thanks. And
though she may not have said so,
I know Tharja is pleased.

I am Sonya. Thank you for inviting
me to the spring festival. Tharja is
probably happier than she looks too.

$nMPID_双界ソニア|What do you think, Tharja? It's fun to
change things up, isn't it? Women
should flaunt their style, I say.$k$p$nMPID_サーリャ|These clothes are too flashy for me.
I can't get used to them.$k$p$nMPID_双界ソニア|I think it'd feel a little more natural if
you were out and about, not hiding
away in the shadows.$k$pYou should be the center of
attention!$k$p$nMPID_サーリャ|Are you sure? This isn't a trick, is
it? I will hex you if you're lying.$k$p$nMPID_双界ソニア|Come and see. I'm certain it'll take
just a moment for you to see I'm
telling the truth. To center stage!$k$p$nMPID_サーリャ|Hey... Wait a second!$k$pBut then again, if it makes him go
all red in the face, I should seize
this chance. I'll do my best...
えいっ
そおれっ
きゃああっ
んもう…！
何するのよ…
$nMPID_二人|Time to wake up!
$nMPID_二人|We're the ravishing... Rabbits.
$nMPID_双界ソニア|Catch me if you can...
$nMPID_サーリャ|Yes, I know. Ridiculous.
You caught me...
Playtime's over, Sonya.
Lose and I'll hex you.
"Let our beauty enchant you!" "What?"
"Bo-oing!" "That's the spirit!"
うふっ
"Don't we look fine?" "Speak for yourself."
We have a plan, right?
Let's hop on over.
Fine, I'm going.

$nMPID_双界ソニア|Spring certainly is a wonderful time
of year. The flowers are blooming,
the breeze is blowing...

It feels as though nature itself is
luring us out of hibernation just in
time for the festival. Don't you agree?

$nMPID_サーリャ|I do not. Are we honestly expected to
put on a bunny act? This whole thing
is a waste of time.

$nMPID_双界ソニア|Oh, come now! You're still upset
about the bunny ears? You look
absolutely ravishing.

As I've said before, beautiful women
should celebrate their beauty. What
you're wearing is that celebration!

$nMPID_サーリャ|How long did you spend practicing
that speech in the mirror?

On the other hand, perhaps I could
use such a "celebration" to draw
Robin's affections...

$nMPID_双界ソニア|You didn't tell me you had your eye
on someone. Who is this mystery
man? What's he like?

$nMPID_サーリャ|Well, yesterday he cracked his
knuckles five times, he used two
spoons for his three meals...

$nMPID_双界ソニア|That's…interesting. I won't ask how
you know all that.

I can see that you're head over heels
for him, and this is your chance to get
his attention! So go on, take the lead!

$nMPID_サーリャ|If it may help, I suppose I can mimic
the actions of those who have worn
this ridiculous costume in the past.

Ahem... "Hippity hop! I am a cute little
bunny! I enjoy burrowing, cursing
my enemies, and eating carrots!"

$nMPID_双界ソニア|That's the right direction! I'm sure
you'll have him eating out of your
hand in no time!

$nMPID_サーリャ|"I'd be very 'hoppy' to keep warm
with you this spring!" ...Eh?

$nMPID_双界ソニア|OK, that's enough practice. Let's take
to the stage and steal the show!

$nMPID_サーリャ|If we must. I suppose that if it's for
Robin, I can endure just about
anything—even a performance like this.
